title: Did the Pieto Orourke campaign try to get the VFW Hall to drop their American flags?
subtitle: The Senate campaign in Peto Aurroc denies the question of the VFW leader if the flags can be raised to the municipal hall.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Beto O'Rourke campaign asked the leader of the foreign veterans if the American flags could be lifted before the event.
